about_the_game:
DEMO FEATURES:

Training: Improve your skills through training and make a difference in the matches.

Gym: Enhance your football skills and stay in shape with various workouts in the gym.

Bar: Socialize with other characters by going on bar outings, build relationships, and boost your morale.

Match: Reap the rewards of your training in matches, showcase your performance, and lead your team to victory.

Home: Rest at home, recharge your energy, and personalize your space for relaxation.
detailed_description:
DEMO FEATURES:

Training: Improve your skills through training and make a difference in the matches.

Gym: Enhance your football skills and stay in shape with various workouts in the gym.

Bar: Socialize with other characters by going on bar outings, build relationships, and boost your morale.

Match: Reap the rewards of your training in matches, showcase your performance, and lead your team to victory.

Home: Rest at home, recharge your energy, and personalize your space for relaxation.
name: Football Life Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Live the life of a professional footballer both on and off the field. Train, play matches, manage your social life, climb the career ladder, and spend your earned money. Decorate your life with luxury while managing your relationships and finances.
